tool_description: Get the current price of a product from the URL.
name: Price Retrieve
title: Price Retrieve

api_list.name: /price
api_list.description: Get the current price from a URL. Keep in mind this can take a while to get depending on how fast the website responds and other things.

required_parameters.name: product
required_parameters.description: The URL of the product you want to get the price for.
